list-item.p: Eligible and started on ART—patients who were eligible for treatment at entry into care or became eligible during follow-up and who had started treatment while attending CTA;
Eligible but not started on ART—patients who were eligible for treatment at entry into care or became eligible during follow-up but who did not start treatment while attending CTA;
Not eligible and not started on ART—patients who remained ineligible for starting ART during the duration of their attendance at CTA;

Not eligible but started on ART—patients treated before eligibility. This group corresponds to individuals for whom the initiation of treatment was decided on the basis of criteria (such as AIDS stage during follow-up, co-infections (tuberculosis, hepatitis B), pregnancy, serodiscordance, belonging to key populations, viral load, etc.) that were not taken into account in our definition of eligibility. This group represents less than 10% of the population analyzed and is not integrated into the group of treated patients for the sake of simplification.
